title: 17-year-old shoots self in hand in central Toledo
content:
Updated Oct. 7, 2015 at 3:36 p.m.
A 17-year-old boy accidentally shot himself in the hand in central Toledo late Tuesday, authorities said.
The name and condition of the victim were not released.
The incident occurred about 10:45 p.m. in the 1200 block of Buckingham Street, according to Toledo police.
